ModMetaData.name: Field Administer
ModMetaData.author: JackDeg
ModMetaData.description: This is a very simple mod that allows a colonist to administer downed pawns drugs from their inventory. Requires a mod that allows items to be picked up to a pawns inventory such as pickup and haul, combat extended, smart medicine, rpgstyle inventory or whatever you can think of. Best used with a mod that also allows stabilising so the pawn doesn't die on the way to get help...
